snippet: To Chrysler, Ford and General Motors, Europe no longer presents a great opportunity to sell American cars in foreign markets.
abstract: American automobile models are largely absent at 83rd International Motor Show in Geneva.
lead_paragraph: To Chrysler, Ford and General Motors, Europe no longer presents a great opportunity to sell American cars in foreign markets.

headline.seo: Detroit Metal Largely Absent at Swiss Show
